    Multielectrode arrays for functional phenotyping of neurons from induced pluripotent stem cell models of neurodevelopmental disorders

    Published in MDPI Biology, 2022

    Recommended citation: McCready, F. P., Gordillo-Sampedro, S., Pradeepan, K., Martinez-Trujillo, J. & Ellis, J. Multielectrode Arrays for Functional Phenotyping of Neurons from Induced Pluripotent Stem Cell Models of Neurodevelopmental Disorders. Biology (Basel) 11, 316 (2022). https://www.mdpi.com/2079-7737/11/2/316
